publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1415 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Belmont Academy Parliament Success-That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Belmont Academy in Ayr for winning the National Youth Parliament competition, Holyrood Model, where the pupils took on roles of MSPs and conducted their own parliamentary sessions, bringing to life the process of parliament and devolved government.

S2M-1415 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Belmont Academy Parliament Success-That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Belmont Academy in Ayr for winning the National Youth Parliament competition, Holyrood Model, where the pupils took on roles of MSPs and conducted their own parliamentary sessions, bringing to life the process of parliament and devolved government. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S2M-1415 Belmont Academy Parliament Success (lodged on 3 June 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-1415 Belmont Academy Parliament Success (lodged on 3 June 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1415 Belmont Academy Parliament Success (lodged on 3 June 2004) John Swinburne*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-1415 Belmont Academy Parliament Success (lodged on 3 June 2004) John Scott*
